body:
I bet you've seen enough of these.
Well... ask away, lol.
body_tagged:

title: Yeah, another AMA

replies.body:
To be honest, I have no idea.
I made this account name (not the Minecraft account) when I was in 4th grade, so I really have no clue.
I really have to think on that now... god dangit xP
replies.body_tagged:
To be honest, I have no idea.
I made this account name (not the Minecraft account) when I was in 4th grade, so I really have no clue.
I really have to think on that now... god dangit xP

replies.body:
1. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie apocalypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
2. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?
3. What's up with the cinnamoncroc? xD

I'm really tired right now and don't feel like making up more questions, so if I remember, I'll just give you some more in the morning :3

3. What's up with the cinnamoncroc? xD

I'm really tired right now and don't feel like making up more questions, so if I remember, I'll just give you some more in the morning :3

replies.body:
1.) Hmmmm... probably a baseball bat that I keep in my room. Effective weapon in emergency situations and provides occasional comedy effect.
2.) Either an eagle (to fly and stuffs) or a monkey (because I always wanted to know what it would be like to have a tail...)
3.) cinammoncroc000 was an account name that I made when I was in 4th grade for... guess what... my new WEBKINZ account.
...
yeah um I've carried that name ever since then.
I love cinnamon, but the croc... well... it's short for crocodile but idk rly.
